title: Pruning failing on collection modified
body:
2020-11-25 18:33:48.1725|ERROR|71|BlockchainProcessor encountered an exception. System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute.
   at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.Enumerator.MoveNext()
   at Nethermind.Trie.Pruning.TrieStore.PruneCache() in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Trie/Pruning/TrieStore.cs:line 393
   at Nethermind.Trie.Pruning.TrieStore.Prune() in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Trie/Pruning/TrieStore.cs:line 312
   at Nethermind.Trie.Pruning.TrieStore.CreateCommitSet(Int64 blockNumber) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Trie/Pruning/TrieStore.cs:line 532
   at Nethermind.Trie.Pruning.TrieStore.EnsureCommitSetExistsForBlock(Int64 blockNumber) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Trie/Pruning/TrieStore.cs:line 616
   at Nethermind.Trie.Pruning.TrieStore.FinishBlockCommit(TrieType trieType, Int64 blockNumber, TrieNode root) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Trie/Pruning/TrieStore.cs:line 194
   at Nethermind.Trie.PatriciaTree.Commit(Int64 blockNumber) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Trie/PatriciaTree.cs:line 177
   at Nethermind.State.StateProvider.CommitTree(Int64 blockNumber) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.State/StateProvider.cs:line 743
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.PreCommitBlock(Keccak newBranchStateRoot, Int64 blockNumber) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/Processing/BlockProcessor.cs:line 166
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.Process(Keccak newBranchStateRoot, List`1 suggestedBlocks, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/Processing/BlockProcessor.cs:line 111
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.ProcessBranch(ProcessingBranch processingBranch, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/Processing/BlockchainProcessor.cs:line 343
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.Process(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer) in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/Processing/BlockchainProcessor.cs:line 287
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.RunProcessingLoop() in /root/src/nethermind/src/Nethermind/Nethermind.Blockchain/Processing/BlockchainProcessor.cs:line 227
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.InnerInvoke()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.<>c.<.cctor>b__274_0(Object obj)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
--- End of stack trace from previous location where exception was thrown ---
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ExecuteWithThreadLocal(Task& currentTaskSlot, Thread threadPoolThread)

I just got this error and I'm not sure what happened, but I found this issue...looks related.

`1.10.37-0-068e5c399-20210312/X64-Linux/5.0.3`

```
2021-03-12 14:38:35.7586|ERROR|53|BlockchainProcessor encountered an exception. System.InvalidOperationException: Collection was modified; enumeration operation may not execute.
   at System.Collections.Generic.HashSet`1.Enumerator.MoveNext()
   at Nethermind.State.Witnesses.WitnessCollector.Persist(Keccak blockHash)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.Process(Keccak newBranchStateRoot, List`1 suggestedBlocks, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.ProcessBranch(ProcessingBranch processingBranch, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.Process(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.RunProcessingLoop()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.InnerInvoke()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.<>c.<.cctor>b__277_0(Object obj)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
--- End of stack trace from previous location ---
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ExecuteWithThreadLocal(Task& currentTaskSlot, Thread threadPoolThread)
   ```

Also see this error:
```
2021-03-12 14:35:17.9793|ERROR|46|BlockchainProcessor encountered an exception. System.InvalidOperationException: Operations that change non-concurrent collections must have exclusive access. A concurrent update 
was performed on this collection and corrupted its state. The collection's state is no longer correct.
   at System.Collections.Generic.HashSet`1.AddIfNotPresent(T value, Int32& location)
   at Nethermind.State.Witnesses.WitnessCollector.Add(Keccak hash)
   at Nethermind.State.Witnesses.WitnessingStore.get_Item(Byte[] key)
   at Nethermind.Trie.Pruning.TrieStore.LoadRlp(Keccak keccak)
   at Nethermind.Trie.TrieNode.ResolveNode(ITrieNodeResolver tree)
   at Nethermind.Trie.PatriciaTree.TraverseBranch(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext)
   at Nethermind.Trie.PatriciaTree.TraverseNode(TrieNode node, TraverseContext traverseContext)
   at Nethermind.Trie.PatriciaTree.Run(Span`1 updatePath, Int32 nibblesCount, Byte[] updateValue, Boolean isUpdate, Boolean ignoreMissingDelete, Keccak startRootHash)
   at Nethermind.Trie.PatriciaTree.Get(Span`1 rawKey, Keccak rootHash)
   at Nethermind.State.StateTree.Get(Address address, Keccak rootHash)
   at Nethermind.State.StateProvider.GetState(Address address)
   at Nethermind.State.StateProvider.GetAndAddToCache(Address address)
   at Nethermind.State.StateProvider.AccountExists(Address address)
   at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer, Boolean isCall)
   at Nethermind.Evm.TransactionProcessor.Execute(Transaction transaction, BlockHeader block, ITxTracer txTracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.ProcessTransactions(Block block, ProcessingOptions processingOptions, IBlockTracer blockTracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.ProcessBlock(Block block, IBlockTracer blockTracer, ProcessingOptions options)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.ProcessOne(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockProcessor.Process(Keccak newBranchStateRoot, List`1 suggestedBlocks, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer blockTracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.ProcessBranch(ProcessingBranch processingBranch, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.Process(Block suggestedBlock, ProcessingOptions options, IBlockTracer tracer)
   at Nethermind.Blockchain.Processing.BlockchainProcessor.RunProcessingLoop()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.InnerInvoke()
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.<>c.<.cctor>b__277_0(Object obj)
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
--- End of stack trace from previous location ---
   at System.Threading.ExecutionContext.RunInternal(ExecutionContext executionContext, ContextCallback callback, Object state)
   at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.ExecuteWithThreadLocal(Task& currentTaskSlot, Thread threadPoolThread)
```
